title: Dynamic Island on the iPhone 14 Pro: How to use the iPhone's latest software trick
description: There's a new name for the notch on the iPhone 14 Pro that brings with it new features and fancy animations. Here's what you need to know.

title: I tried Kim Kardashian's scent-based water bottle: It was a tasteful mess
description: Review: The Air Up water bottle has been trending for its unique ability to flavor water simply by harnessing your sense of smell. Does this $40 water bottle live up to the hype?

title: How to use Split View for split-screen on iPad
description: Here's how to make better use of the big screen on the iPad by using multiple apps at once.

title: Worldwide tablet market takes a hit amid global economic hardships
description: A new report by research firm Strategy Analytics shows that inflation and post-pandemic conditions have changed how people view tablets-- as a luxury instead of a need.

title: How to get a Facebook Messenger client on Linux
description: Here's how to install a Facebook Messenger client on different Linux distributions, even though there isn't an official client available.

title: Mary Jo Foley looks back on a momentous 16 years of covering Microsoft for ZDNET
description: In the past decade and a half, Microsoft has been through 3 different CEOs, changed flagship products, and revolutionized the culture of the company. No one has covered it more thoroughly than MJF.

title: AI's true goal may no longer be intelligence
description: Some scholars of AI warn that the present technologies may never add up to "true" intelligence or "human" intelligence. But much of the world may not care about that.

title: Microsoft Authenticator gains feature to thwart spam attacks on MFA
description: And the iOS Authenticator app now uses App Transport Security.

title: Microsoft: Raspberry Robin USB worm hits nearly 1,000 organizations in the past month
description: Widely distributed worm evolves into one of the largest currently active malware distribution platforms.

title: Windows 11 gets MacOS-like instant smartphone hotspot access
description: Windows 11 users can now instantly access their smartphone's internet connection - provided they have a Samsung device.

title: Nothing Ear Stick review: Earbuds, but make it fashion
description: There's always something cooking with UK tech company, Nothing. Its newest earbuds, the Ear Stick, may not be sound blockers, but they are certainly eye-catchers.

title: LG Electronics feels the brunt of weak consumer demand in third quarter earnings
description: Its operating profit increased 25% from a year ago but last year's earnings included a one-off cost from General Motors' recall of electric vehicles.

title: Data will play key role in sustaining SEA digital economy growth
description: Southeast Asia's digital economy is projected to reach $200 billion in gross merchandise value this year, but market players will need to understand consumer behaviour to sustain growth as adoption of online services matures across the region.
